mapper.select: SELECT P.ORD_NUM, TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS PAY_DATE, PAY_ADDR, PAY_TOAL, ORD_STATUS, TO_CHAR(DELIVERY_TIME,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS DELIVERY_TIME FROM PAYMENT P JOIN JUMUN J ON P.ORD_NUM = J.ORD_NUM WHERE J.USER_ID = #{id} AND ORD_CANCEL = 'N' ORDER BY ORD_NUM DESC

SELECT OP.STO_NUM, M.MENU_NUM, B.BRAND_CODE, MORD_NUM, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_PIC, BRAND_PIC, STO_LAT, STO_LNG, STO_ADDR FROM ORDER_PRO OP JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON OP.STO_NUM = SI.STO_NUM JOIN JUMUN_DETAIL JD ON OP.ORD_NUM = JD.ORD_NUM JOIN MENU M ON JD.MENU_NUM = M.MENU_NUM JOIN BRAND B ON M.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE WHERE OP.ORD_NUM = #{ord_num}
